00012 template <class LTYPE>
00013 struct stItem
00014 {
00015   stItem<LTYPE> *next;
00016   stItem<LTYPE> *prev;
00017   LTYPE         object;
00018 };
00019 
00020 template <class LTYPE>
00021 class tpList
00022 {
00023 private:
00024   int           numItems;
00025   stItem<LTYPE> *first;
00026   stItem<LTYPE> *last;
00027 
00028 public:
00029   tpList(void);
00030   tpList(const tpList<LTYPE>&);

00095 template <class LTYPE>
00096 tpList<LTYPE>::~tpList(void)
00097 {
00098   while(numItems>0) DeleteItem(numItems-1);
00099 
00100   // cerr << "DESTROYING LIST" << endl;
00101 }

00109   return(numItems);

00112 template <class LTYPE>
00113 LTYPE* tpList<LTYPE>::GetItemPointer(const int position) const
00114 {
00115   // Check for valid position
00116   if(position<0 || position>numItems-1)
00117   {
00118     char message[MESLEN];
00119     sprintf(message, "Invalid position.\n  POS = %d\n  MAX = %d", position, numItems-1);
00120     throw clException("tpList", "GetItemPointer", message);
00121   }
00122 
00123   // Search for correct item
00124   stItem<LTYPE> *current = first;
00125   int           pos      = 0;
00126 
00127   while(pos<position && current!=last)
00128   {
00129     pos++;
00130     current = current->next;
00131   }
00132 
00133   return(&(current->object));
00134 }

00136 template <class LTYPE>
00137 LTYPE tpList<LTYPE>::GetItem(const int position) const
00138 {
00139   // Check for valid position
00140   if(position<0 || position>numItems-1)
00141   {
00142     char message[MESLEN];
00143     sprintf(message, "Invalid position.\n  POS = %d\n  MAX = %d", position, numItems-1);
00144     throw clException("tpList", "GetItem", message);
00145   }
00146 
00147   // Search for correct item
00148   stItem<LTYPE> *current = first;
00149   int           pos      = 0;
00150 
00151   while(pos<position && current!=last)
00152   {
00153     pos++;
00154     current = current->next;
00155   }
00156 
00157   return(current->object);

00160 template <class LTYPE>
00161 int tpList<LTYPE>::GetIndex(const LTYPE item) const
00162 {
00163   int index  = 0;
00164   bool found = false;
00165 
00166   while(index<numItems && !found)
00167   {
00168     found = (GetItem(index)==item);
00169     index++;
00170   }
00171 
00172   if(!found)
00173   {
00174     index=-1;
00175   }
00176 
00177   return(--index);
00178 }

00180 /*
00181 ** Methods for item manipulation
00182 */
00183 template <class LTYPE>
00184 int tpList<LTYPE>::AddItem(const LTYPE &object)
00185 {
00186   stItem<LTYPE> *item = new stItem<LTYPE>;
00187 
00188   // Check memory
00189   if(!item)
00190   {
00191     throw clException("tpList", "AddItem", "Could not allocate memory.");
00192   }
00193 
00194   // Update first
00195   if (numItems==0)
00196   {
00197     first = item;
00198   }
00199 
00200   // Update item fields
00201   item->object = object;
00202   item->prev   = last;
00203   item->next   = NULL;
00204 
00205   // Update last
00206   last = item;
00207 
00208   // Update previous item
00209   if (item->prev) item->prev->next = item;
00210 
00211   // Update number of items
00212   numItems++;
00213 
00214   return(numItems-1);
00215 }
00216 
00217 template <class LTYPE>
00218 int tpList<LTYPE>::InsertItem(const int position, const LTYPE &object)
00219 {
00220   // Check for valid position
00221   if(position<0 || position>numItems-1)
00222   {
00223     char message[MESLEN];
00224     sprintf(message, "Invalid position.\n  POS = %d\n  MAX = %d", position, numItems-1);
00225     throw clException("tpList", "InsertItem", message);
00226   }
00227 
00228   // Search for correct item
00229   stItem<LTYPE> *current = first;
00230   int           pos      = 0;
00231 
00232   while(pos<position && current!=last)
00233   {
00234     pos++;
00235     current = current->next;
00236   }
00237 
00238   // Create a new item
00239   stItem<LTYPE> *item = new stItem<LTYPE>;
00240 
00241   // Check memory
00242   if(!item)
00243   {
00244     throw clException("tpList", "InsertItem", "Could not allocate memory.");
00245   }
00246 
00247   // Update item fields
00248   item->object = object;
00249   item->prev   = current->prev;
00250   item->next   = current;
00251 
00252   // Update previous and next items
00253   if (item->prev) item->prev->next = item;
00254   if (item->next) item->next->prev = item;
00255 
00256   // Update first
00257   if (pos==0)          first = item;
00258 
00259   // Update number of items
00260   numItems++;
00261 
00262   return(pos);
00263 }
00264 
00265 template <class LTYPE>
00266 int tpList<LTYPE>::DeleteItem(const int position)
00267 {
00268   // Check for valid position
00269   if(position<0 || position>numItems-1)
00270   {
00271     char message[MESLEN];
00272     sprintf(message, "Invalid position.\n  POS = %d\n  MAX = %d", position, numItems-1);
00273     throw clException("tpList", "DeleteItem", message);
00274   }
00275 
00276   // Search for correct item
00277   stItem<LTYPE> *current = first;
00278   int           pos      = 0;
00279 
00280   while(pos<position && current!=last)
00281   {
00282     pos++;
00283     current = current->next;
00284   }
00285 
00286   // Update the previous and next items
00287   if (current->prev) current->prev->next = current->next;
00288   if (current->next) current->next->prev = current->prev;
00289 
00290   // Update first and last
00291   if (pos==0)          first = current->next;
00292   if (pos==numItems-1) last  = current->prev;
00293 
00294   // Delete current item
00295   delete current;
00296 
00297   // Update the number of items
00298   numItems--;
00299 
00300   return(numItems);
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*
00304 ** Assign method
00305 */
00306 template <class LTYPE>
00307 void tpList<LTYPE>::Assign(const tpList<LTYPE> &source)
00308 {
00309   // Delete all items if any
00310   for (int i=0; i<numItems; i++)
00311   {
00312     DeleteItem(i);
00313   }
00314 
00315   // Copy all items from source
00316   for (int j=0; j<source.GetNumberItems(); j++)
00317   {
00318     AddItem(source.GetItem(j));
00319   }
00320 }

00331 template <class LTYPE>

00333 {
00334   return(GetItem(position));
